subject: Re: TFC Podiatry website Changes
preview: Looks good now..Thank you so much!  Regards Reethu

full_threads.body:
Looks good now..Thank you so much!

Regards
Reethu

Hi Reethu, 

We have cleared the cache, please check again. Can you please check now?

The website is broken again https://cbo.d.pr/C2muPt

Regards
Reethu

HI Reethu,

Confirming we have updated the sticky header on mobile and the footer form. Let me know if this works for you?
Looks great, please send to client.
@heath https://www.tfcpodiatry.com.au/ all good now. can you check your end if this works for you?

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Upon client request, the sticky header(Book Appointment and Phone number) doesn't work on mobile https://cbo.d.pr/7zeR0M, as most of their patients use mobile. For better navigation, Can we add something like this https://cbo.d.pr/tlgWDL and make it sticky in mobile

Note: The submit button is not being displayed properly in mobile https://cbo.d.pr/5AvBjy. Please fix it

Any questions, please let me know

Regards
Reethu

Hi Reethu, 

Sure, confirming we have made the below update.

Can you please move the Services button besides About https://cbo.d.pr/gOIh7R for easy and better navigation

Regards
Reethu

Thank you! Looks good now. I'll check with the client and let you know regarding the facebook messenger button

Regards
Reethu

Hi Reethu, 

Can you please check now?
The website layout is not displaying properly https://cbo.d.pr/X5oU5C. Please look into this and fix it ASAP

Hi Reethu, 

We have cleared the cache, please check again.

Morning Team,

I don't see the sticky header menu yet(only the book appointment button and phone numbers is sticky)
Phone numbers are not clickable too. Please check this https://cbo.d.pr/5jsc5j

Any questions, please let me know

Regards
Reethu

Hi Reethu,

Sure, we have updated the menu to be sticky and phone numbers to be clickable. Cheers!
@joel Can you please help me with this one, no rush, tomorrow is fine: https://www.loom.com/share/ba7f06d7b9f94de28faa7bd78c1948dd

Awesome..Thanks for the update. Can we also make the header menu "sticky. Please make the phone numbers clickable https://cbo.d.pr/cAe9dh

Regarding the Facebook messenger button, I'll confirm with the client and get the facebook logins

Regards
Reethu

Hi Reethu, 

Confirming we have made the Appointment top bar and phone numbers 'sticky', so it stays in position as they scroll. 

We can also add the Facebook Messenger chat to the website. We will require their facebook logins to connect it. Regarding the speed delay that the chat bot can create... It will create some small delay, so it needs to be weighed up if the reduction in speed is justified versus the amount of prospective patients that will use the feature? Let me know?
@heath my I ask their facebook link? and I'll try to add manually.
@heath yes we will use this plugin for facebook  bubble chat https://wordpress.org/plugins/facebook-messenger-customer-chat/

@manuel can you please make the header bar of the https://www.tfcpodiatry.com.au/ website sticky? 

Also, what do we need to put the facebook messenger on their site? Is it a script? I can't remember?

Hi Team,

Hope you are doing well

The TFC Podiatry client wanted us to implement the below two listed changes on their website to improve their user experience

They would love to see a book appointment button that scrolls down on the page as well as scrolling facebook messenger button something like this https://cbo.d.pr/ndSit8

These are both things they have had in the past, but the client removed to try and speed the website up.

Are these things that are doable? Please let me know and provide any other recommendations that we can do for them to improve their user experience. Right now, I think the website is not very user friendly. The look and feel is not even so good

Any questions, please let me know

Regards
Reethu



--
Reethu Nookala
SEO Marketing Specialist
